a:r.a:t: Executive Summary

Saw Mill Capital and management have invested significantly in Gateway Packaging since 2010, resulting in an attractive flexible CPG pet care packaging platform with significant new business momentum, cost saving opportunities and actionable growth opportunities
Pet care focus:
highly attractive, growing market where Gateway’s sales have more than doubled since 2014
Strategic, thoughtful expansion of product offering:
evolved to a comprehensive “one-stop shop,” providing paper SOS, stand-up pouches, pinch bottom open mouth, hybrid, paper woven and Totani
Meaningful investments generating results:
$27 million invested since 2014 in new and existing equipment, including materials test lab, high speed lines, etc.
New product development and focus on innovation (e.g., graphical, physical, point-of-use features, new products)
Added best-in-class management team
Two acquisitions completed (e.g., Werthan, Apex Bag)
Recent commercial awards (e.g., Well Pet SOS, Nestle soft touch)
Saw Mill Capital and Gateway are considering a sale following the growth of the business, momentum with new wins and current market conditions
Investment Highlights
Why Lincoln
The Leading Designer and Manufacturer of Flexible CPG Pet Care Packaging Products
“One-Stop Shop” Offering Comprehensive Product Capabilities
Acquirers and the
Gateway Process “Playbook”
Prepare roadshow and other marketing materials through August and September – Lincoln to work closely with management and Saw Mill to properly articulate Gateway’s equity story
Lincoln to host roadshow meetings with high priority strategic acquirers
Schedule dinners with Omar to follow in mid- to late-September
Broad market launch to other strategic and financial acquirers early Oct.
Lincoln to carry the “laboring oar” of the process, coach and advise management on critical messaging and minimize burden on management
Experienced and Pedigreed Senior Management Team
Leading global investment bank
with deep domain expertise in flexible packaging (pouches, bags, films)
Significant relevant transaction experience
leading to deep understanding of how to best position businesses like Gateway
Extensive strategic and financial acquirer relationships
and deep, specific understanding of fit, ability to pay and behavior
Thoughtful, creative and customized process
tailored to specific situations
Proven, hands-on
execution team
History of delivering
outlier results
Well-Capitalized Operations with Capacity for Growth
Entrenched, Long-Term Relationships with Blue Chip Customers
New Product Development Focus Supported by Patents and Leading Innovation
Lincoln is highly confident in achieving a valuation of
2017E Adj. EBITDA of $22.5 million: $200–$225+ million
Situation Overview
Attractive Financial Profile with Credible Near-Term Forecast

Gateway is a comprehensive provider of flexible CPG pet care packaging solutions. The Company is one of the only providers of scale with an extensive and innovative product offering to partner with blue-chip customers and brands in a rapidly growing pet care market
Numerous organic and acquisition growth levers
(e.g., increase wallet share with existing customers, add new pet care customers, expand further into human food and other market, add woven capabilities, acquisitions)
* TBD pending financial wherewithal
